title: Elena Ethel "Elly" Schlein - UJE - Ukrainian Jewish Encounter
snippet: Schlein's maternal grandfather, Agostino Viviani, was an Italian Socialist Party politician, a senator from 1972 to 1979, and a High Council of the Judiciary member. Schlein's family roots on her father's side go back to Zhovkva, a town in the ...

title: 4 Things to Know About Elly Schlein, Face of Italy's Largest Opposition Party | ITALY Magazine
snippet: On March 12, 37-year-old Elly Schlein will officially take the helm of Italy's struggling Partito Democratico (Democratic Party or PD). Here's a rundown of her biography and basic stats.

title: Italy's left picks 'anti-Meloni' politician Elly Schlein to lead the party | Euronews
snippet: After cutting her political teeth across the Atlantic, Schlein became an impassioned youth activist for the Democratic Party and was elected as a member of the European Parliament in 2014.
